product_name: Patagonia Los Lobos Fleece Jacket - Girls' - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Made from deep-pile polyester fleece, the sumptuous girls' Patagonia Los Lobos jacket boasts sleek styling, a tall collar and handwarmer pockets. Breathable, quick-drying and non-pilling polyester fleece offers warmth without a lot of weight, so she stays comfortable. Front princess seaming lends a contoured fit. Cozy hand pockets are lined with brushed tricot. 100% recyclable through Patagonia's Common Threads Recycling Program-simply return your worn out item to Patagonia. Closeout.
short_description: Made from deep-pile polyester fleece, the sumptuous girls' Patagonia Los Lobos jacket boasts sleek styling, a tall collar and handwarmer pockets.
